title: Exciting New Year’s Big Sale!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>I ate a lot of mochi soup on new years. How about you, Kasumi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin.... was supposed to be safe.... but Kasumin failed. The mochi was just too delicious~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah, you just can’t resist, right? But it’s okay! Even if we get a little bit puffy, we can just follow Umi-chan’s training plan and....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>No no no! Don’t bring that up, Kayoko! Whenever Kasumin thinks about it, Kasumin gets chills down my spine....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>S-, sorry! Then, let’s think about happy things. Like the sale we’re going to! Are you after something specific, Kasumi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin wants a coat and boots~. They’re pretty expensive, so Kasumin would love to get them while they’re on sale! What about you, Kayoko?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Let’s see.... I want a warm knit sweater. And maybe some cute training clothes too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ah, Kasumin also wants to look at some training clothes! New ones will certainly give me more motivation!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Training.... Umi-chan’s training plan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Aaaargh! The memories are coming back again—!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
